page.title: 14 Life In Quaperlake Street
page.content: {Life in Quaperlake Street has changed immensely over the years.For instance there used to be many services and shops,now there are only five shops and far fewer services or businesses. The shops include one selling clothes,two specialising in antiques and one electrical.There is also a dentist,a bowls club,playschool and a cattle haulage business. The changes that have taken place show that smaller shops and smaller factories or businesses have,over the last forty or fifty years moved away from the area or closed down. One local resident told us that all these changes are entirely due to "progress" and must be accepted.
